resources.string: The OANC is a community resource that is freely available for download and use for research and development, including commercial development.

The OANC is a community resource that is freely available for download and use for research and development, including commercial development.

The philosophy behind the OANC is one of collaborative community development, wherein members of the community can freely use all of our data and resources without restriction (including commercial use), with the expectation that they will contribute derived data and annotations when possible. We also hope that the community will contribute additional data to be included in the OANC in the future.
